ovdesc.p: This file contains the composites monthly performance figures.
It's structure is : 1 record per composite and per month.
This file is monthly updated by a batch job called AM.COMP.HIST.UPD and is used for composite reporting.
See also files : AM.COMPOSITE.HIST.DETAIL, AM.COMPOSITE.HIST.EXCL and AM.COMPOSITE.YEARLY.HIST

desc.p: This field contains the sum of the equally weighted daily performance on gross values.
The value (P.Monthly.Daily.Perf) is taken from the AM.COMPOSITE.HIST.DETAIL record.
This field contains the sum of the portfolio weighted Modified Dietz performance on gross values.
Both the values (P.W.MD.Perf & Beg.Month.Value) are taken from the AM.COMPOSITE.HIST.DETAIL record.

Sum of the portfolio weighted modified dietz performance. The cumulative modified dietz performance of all portfolios in the composite is weighted according to the portfolio market value of each portfolio against the total market value of all portfolios in the composite.
The total beginning market value is the market value based on the reference currency of the portfolio on the 1st day of the month for which the composite performance calculation is being made.
The total end market value is the market value based on the reference currency of the composite of all portfolios included in the composite on the final day of the month (VALUATION.DATE) .
This is the number of non fee paying portfolios included in the composite calculation at the end of the month.
Number of portfolios included in the composite. This figure does not include portfolios linked to the composite but excluded because the portfolio breaks some of the exclusion parameters.
Numeric character, field generated by T24.
This is the total market value of all portfolios linked to composites.
This field contains the sum of the portfolio weighted daily performance on gross values.
Both the values (P.W.Daily.Perf & Beg.Month.Value) are taken from the AM.COMPOSITE.HIST.DETAIL record.
This field contains the sum of the equally weighted Modified Deitz performance on gross values.
The value (P.Monthly.Md.Perf) is taken from the AM.COMPOSITE.HIST.DETAIL record.
The valuation date is the last day of the month for the composite performance calculation.
Standard date format (mandatory field generated by T24. )
Sum of the equally weighted daily performance. The cumulative daily performance of all portfolios in the composite is weighted equally over each portfolio. i.e. divided by the number of portfolios.

Sum of the equally weighted modified dietz performance. The cumulative modified dietz performance of all portfolios in the composite is weighted equally over each portfolio. i.e. divided by the number of portfolios.

Sum of the portfolio weighted daily performance. The cumulative daily performance of all portfolios in the composite is weighted according to the portfolio market value of each portfolio against the total market value of all portfolios in the composite.
